Centennial.National Cattlemen's Beef Association:
National Cattlemen's Beef Association (NCBA) is a trade association and lobbying group for beef producers in the United States.
National Cattlemen's Beef Association operates the Cattle Industry Annual Convention & Trade Show and Cattle Industry Summer Conference.


== Advertising campaign ==
National Cattlemen's Beef Association is the group responsible for the ad campaign run in the U.S. using the slogan "Beef.
